Desc: Perhaps there is nothing in the end, but does that mean it is pointless?
Even if you win, this may not change anything. Is this really what you want to do?
If you decide to stick to your choice...
It may not be possible... to fight against fate in the end.
Even if unwilling, even if angry, perhaps this will result in nothing.
Is this really worth your persistence?
If that is what you want, so be it.
If you decide to stick to your choice...
To make the impossible possible by relying on others...
If it was the commandant... Perhaps it's not that hard to understand.
Somewhere on the network, perhaps there are other commandants caught in a struggle.
Similar to just now, you can make the same "sacrifice" to help them.
Well, cowardice and weakness may happen if that's what you wish.
Making such a "sacrifice" means changing something forever. Do you accept it?
And you have no right to decide what kind of people will benefit from this "sacrifice." Do you accept it?
Well, is there anything else you want to say?
Your sacrifice and will have been recognized.
